tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have visited doctor Karan sir for femur implant removal. 
I was very much worried about the surgery and about the difficulty post surgery, but Karan sir explained and made me understand so well about the surgery and recovery time in the very first appointment itself.He did the Surgery and it was successful . Had few dressings after surgery, for almost all visits, he was there and each time, he checked if any issue was there and has advised accordingly. He is very friendly. He pays attention and answers all questions with patience. Very much impressed and happy with the treatment given by doctor Karan  sir, Thank you Sirüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a bike accident 4 months ago and suffered fractures in hand and leg. Dr. Karan Kukreja performed the surgeries, placing plates in both areas. I had to visit several times after surgeries for checkups and dressings. I had an excellent experience with him. He took the time to explain all my questions, the necessary care, and how the healing was progressing. He is very polite and straightforward. Thanks to his exceptional care and expertise, I am now able to walk again and am doing well. I highly recommend Dr. Karan Kukreja for his outstanding medical skill and dedication to his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Karan for my 62-year-old mother when she experienced severe knee pain (both knees) in February 2024. Standing for longer than 20 minutes and activities like climbing stairs and squatting were extremely painful. After conducting a thorough examination he diagnosed her with early-stage knee osteoarthritis and recommended three weeks of physiotherapy along with muscle strengthening exercises, which significantly alleviated her pain. We liked that Dr. Karan closely monitored her progress periodically and provided constant motivation to adhere to the exercise regimen. He emphasizes the importance of exercise and a healthy lifestyle for long-term benefits instead of just prescibing medicines. His proficiency in local languages (Kannada)  did help in making the patient comfortable and no matter how many questions we really appreciate his patience and care. We  would highly recommend  him for any ortho related ailments or surgeries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was a first time visit. Doctor came after almost 1.5 hours waiting and then another 1 hour went as he was checking other patients. When my turn came he again went and we kept on waiting. After complaining to the hospital, they said they arrange for another doctor but that didn‚Äôt happen at all. ******* ******** ****** ****** *** ***** ***** ***** **** ***** ******* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Met Dr. Karan through a reference for my brother‚Äôs Ortho surgery after fractures through road accident. We are very happy with Dr. Karan‚Äôs humane approach towards patients and attending families. 
Not only,  professionally very skilled doctor but very kind human being as well.  He listens carefully and explains well. 
Very happy to have found him at the right time. 
*** ** *** **** ***** ******* ** **********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
2 years back my father-in-law faced a severe accident. His both legs fractured. Left leg tibia bone and right leg femur bone. He got treated in Sparsh hospital by another doctor. There he got closed reduction internal fixation done in both the bones. Started recovering and was able to walk after 3 months. 

Soon after 1 year he started pain in left leg tibia bone. When we went through X-ray the screw has been broken inside also the tibia bone didn‚Äôt get joined properly. 

Then we got to know about Dr. Karan from one of our relative, who has been treated for ankle fracture from him. He was very much satisfied with his treatment. He is one of the best orthopedic doctor. 

We consulted Dr. Karan. He went through the x-ray and examined my father-in-law. He clearly explained what the problem is and what kind of treatment has to be done. He went through medical records of earlier surgery. He gave enough time to clarify all our queries. He suggested for exchange nailing treatment to replace the existing rod. Within two days he operated. The operation was really successful. He properly guided us how to put slowly weight on that leg and how much rest is required. Finally my father-in-law is able to walk freely. In the recent x-ray it clearly showed good progress of bone formation in the joint. 

Entire treatment process was very smooth. Dr. Karan is very much approachable to clarify all queries. Post operation also we visited couple of times to his clinic ‚ÄòLife Orthocare‚Äô for dressing and consultation. I definitely recommend Dr. Karan for any kind of orthopedic treatment.
reply_text:
Thank You for the feedback.Glad to be able to help.
sincerely hope he recovers soon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had near fatal accident 5 years ago,had brain haemorrhage,rib fractures n left hand fracture. All healed except my hand fracture. After 4 unsuccessful surgeries,I came to Dr.Karan Kukreja after an Orthopedist recommended him. He went thru my medical history and the complications of my previous surgeries. He was determined to fix my bone n make me surgery-free.  He did a detailed analysis of my bone and came up with a solution,though I was hesitant initially but got convinced by his sincerity and dedication towards his patients. My bone healed after 5 years of failed surgeries (6 in total).Its been a year of the last surgery, my hand is normal now and am able to do all the work with the hand including driving 2 wheeler. Am really grateful n thankful to Dr.Karan for saving me from more surgeries. He is the best Ortho in Bangalore,very calm,composed,knows his field ,has in-depth knowledge,explains the problem as many times as patients ask without getting irritated. Thank you so much Dr. for giving me hospital free life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
If there is someone who is royally breaking up the negative stereotyping some doctors have managed to make in the minds of the patients, its him.

Visited for my mom's lower limb pain and she underwent a successful hassle-free knee replacement by him. 

I have to say this, he is one of the most polite, professional and clinically sound surgeons we have come across. His approach is clearly indicative of 'first do no harm'. Add to it, he is communicative, and has a re-assuring aura about him. Doctor is well learned and  very bright in my opinion. Mother's recovery was also smooth and painfree and results were good. He explains everything at every stage: consultation, pre and post surgery, and keeps your expectations practical and real by making you aware of every issue and prospective solution, and the extent achievable. 

In short , he is honest and makes no false promises. Guess, that what he means by patient centric approach.
I have  to sincerely thank him and his entire team for everything, and recommend him strongly.
reply_text: Appreciate your time for this feedback!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Leg Pain,Bone Fracture,Lower Back Pain,Knee Pain,Foot Pain,
review: Dr Karan Kukreja is real master of his art. My wife and I visited him on multiple occasions and he treated and fixed the problem on all such events with perfectionism. His understanding of human bone structure is phenomenal. His way of treatment is simple yet effective. True genius

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Today evening I visited Dr Karan Kukreja at Manipal for pain in my right feet . I also have heel spur .He examined my foot and explained to me in detail about the issue.  He also showed me some exercises which I am supposed to do . Unlike other doctors who only show interest in patient if the issue is complex or they can do an upcoming surgery on him/her , Dr Karan is very different. He treats everything with equal seriousness. I have seen doctors tend to neglect minor issues and feel interested only when they see a chance to do surgery . For a patient every issue even a small one is important as it is about his/her health.  Dr  Karan is definitely that doctor who will hear to your small queries and small issues and address them completely.  He gives full information and doesn't rush.  Today I could see he was very  busy yet he addressed my every issue every query. I left happy and with a light heart . Lot of respect for you doctor. 
. Thank you . You are gem .
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback!

review: I was having grievous shoulder pain, despite of consulting orthopedic doctors ** **** *** ** no use. When checking in my friends circle I was referred by my friend to consult with Dr. Karan for his ********* treatment. After consulting Dr. Karan (Good thing about his consultation, he listens to patients without jumping to conclusions and also tries to avoid surgery in first place) suggested to go through physiotherapy for about two months and post that also if pain is not reduced, he said we will think of surgery.I have been doing Subscapular physio exercise, my labral tear pain has reduced to good extent.Thanks to Dr.Karan.
reply_text:
Thanks Neelakant!
wish you a speedy recovery!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I saw Dr.Karan after I had a fall.There were many patients but he obliged as it seemed like an mergency and I was In extreme pain.On examination he suspected a fracture and advised a X Ray.he also gave a painkiller injection and applied a splint .Xray confirmed fracture,so doctor applied plaster at his clinic itself and I have to see him after two weeks now.
I found him to be calm and patient.what I like best was that there was reasonable addressal  of my queries and post treatment care was explained very well.even better,no extra tests or medicines prescribed.
I will definitely recommend him to friends and family as I find this doctor very well read and he has no air about him.entire process was smooth and it seems his dedication for his patients well being is strong!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I took my mother for her knee surgery to Dr Karan Kukreja. He is a true professional and very friendly, who explained in detail the pre and post surgery proces and treatment plan. He followed up post surgery and gave very precise advice which is helping my mother to recover fast. I strongly recommend him as a very competent and friendly orthopedic surgeon. Thanks Dr. Karan. Regards, vivek

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had joint pain in arms and legs and fever. After fever subsided, i saw the doctor. He tried to understand my health history. Asked to get some blood tests and x-ray. Next day based on the reports, he gave medication. I started feeling relieved within a day. But before you visit the clinic, always call so that you dont miss him as he is busy, associated with other hospitals also.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
He gave me a detailed explanation about the reasons as well as care that needs to be taken. I particularly liked the fact that he helped me with preventive measures for avoiding further issues - exercises, dos and donts.
Friendly approach, does not rush for time, and allows to ask all questions and clarifications.
reply_text:
Hi,
Appreciate your feedback.
We stress on Preventive measures as per condition to avoid recurrence and promote mitigation of problem.Holistic patient centric care is our motto.
Glad we could help you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very polite and patient .he gave enough time to explain complaints and asked all relevant questions.his suggested tests and medicines have helped a lot to recover.really appreciate his approach of avoiding unnecessary tests and he is patient centric.**** **** ************* *
reply_text:
Hi,
Thank you for this feedback.
We dont see a point in practicing in a way that makes the patient more worried than he/she already is due to his/her health conditionTherefore ,no running around for unnecessary tests etc if not needed.
Sometimes we may have to for making the best decisions.
Thanks for your time.

Magical hands ! Highly recommend.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went there on my appointment time,after some discussion with Dr. they told to go and do xray and comeback, so after that when we cameback no one on his chamber, then we talked about the dr. To the receptionist,they told they allready gone meet them tomorrow, we said how come without ant pre treatments how they can leave. Then i complained in manipal management they told they will come very soon,after 1hr also dr didn't came,and came in late time,how they are not responding and the hospital. **** ******** *** **** ***** ******* ***** i never ever seen this kind of bad  behaviour from the manipal Hospital, Whitefield,bad experience i can say. Don't spend valuable time and money. Thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I  was happy with my consultation. The doctor is friendly and patiently explained all the possible causes for my thumb pain issue. He recommended medicines and a splint for some weeks. I liked that the doctor didn't suggest unnecessary tests. He said I should wait for a few weeks to see if these simple remedies work otherwise we might have to go ahead with some other measures.

The only problem I had was with the mismanagement of wait time. People were randomly standing around waiting to enter the consultation room. There was a nurse but we had to ask her to call us as people who came to the clinic after us were trying to get their check-up done before us. It would be great if they could just have a simple token system to call out patients according to their wait times.
reply_text:
Hi there,
Thank you for the positive feedback.
 your suggestion has been noted and we are working on it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor operated on me for ACL tear.
The biggest positive point that I found was he explained to me in detail my condition and what treatment is available ,He let me know the available grafts and fixation method that can be used for restoration in a understandable language. really appreciate him involving us in decision making and helping me select a proper graft and fixation method suitable to my age ,work and Lifestyle which includes dancing and running.
My OT and post op recovery was smooth.physiotherapy and follow up was spot on.on discharge doctor even explained all dos and don'ts that helped me get back to work early.My knee feels adequately stable..
I find the doctor and his team very professional and courteous.
Overall we felt to be in safe hands.
My sincere thanks to him,for answering all my queries with patience
reply_text:
Patient involving is important at all steps of patient care.Its one of the patiet rights and we are glad we could help.
Wishing you a speedy recovery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly. Had a discussion with him about half an hour about meniscus injury, how it will effect in the future and what are the exercises to do to reduce the impact of the injury.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: doctor was not available.No info about availabilitypathetic service bad experience horrible experience
reply_text:
Hi Saurav,
At the outset,we regret you could not meet the doctor.We understand your disappointment that comes along with it as well.
Now,here is what happened-
you booked an appointment through practo for october 2,2018,to meet Dr.Karan at Life plus hospitals and it was confirmed.You and everyone else had a national holiday we understand.But doctor didnt have a leave.That evening he had to go in for an emergency surgery,and had asked the staff to cancel all "elective"OPD appointments.Needless to mention,that an emergency is always a priority.
anyhow,so our staff did call up all the patients who had confirmed OPD appointments well in advance.Unfortunately,only you didn't pick up the call.Nor did you call back.Our staff tried again,your phone was out of reach.In middle of other actvities at the hospital,our staff lost track here..and you ended up coming to the hospital,and couldn't meet the doctor.
Now,as we see it,its noones fault.Doctors keep getting pulled in emergency surgeries and phones keep getting missed...As much as we understand your disappoinment,we dont think,that not being able to meet your doctor on your leave day entitles you to call him inefficient at--explaination of the health issue,treatement satisfaction,value for money,wait time,bad service etc etc(all things selected by you).IF YOU DID NOT MEET THE DOCTOR--HOW CAN YOU RATE ALL THIS?:)
our staff called you again the next day to apologise and reschedule and you actually shouted on them again.Not very amicable.
We value our patients and take atmost care to ensure their wellbeing while trying our best to match up time constraints and other concerns.In a day to day life,these kind of things are bound to happen,its only an operational issue that could have been avaoided,had the call connected
Anyway,we wish your health concern has been addressed.If not,you are always welcome to see the doctor on prior appoinment again.
wishing you a healthy life.
